verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H834><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5337><s%> him from the hand <S%H3709><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> his enemies, <S%H341><s%> and from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Saul: <S%H7586><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I will love <S%H7355><s%> you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> my strength. <S%H2391><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is my rock, <S%H5553><s%> and my fortress, <S%H4686><s%> and my deliverer; <S%H6403><s%> my God, <S%H410><s%> my strength, <S%H6697><s%> in whom I will trust; <S%H2620><s%> my buckler, <S%H4043><s%> and the horn <S%H7161><s%> of my salvation, <S%H3468><s%> and my high <S%H4869><s%> tower. <S%H4869><s%>
I will call <S%H7121><s%> on the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> who is worthy to be praised: <S%H1984><s%> so shall I be saved <S%H3467><s%> from my enemies. <S%H341><s%>
The sorrows <S%H2256><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> compassed <S%H661><s%> me, and the floods <S%H5158><s%> of ungodly <S%H1100><s%> men made me afraid. <S%H1204><s%>
The sorrows <S%H2256><s%> of hell <S%H7585><s%> compassed <S%H5437><s%> me about: the snares <S%H4170><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> prevented <S%H6923><s%> me.

In my distress <S%H6862><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> on the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and cried <S%H7768><s%> to my God: <S%H430><s%> he heard <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> out of his temple, <S%H1964><s%> and my cry <S%H7775><s%> came <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, even into his ears. <S%H241><s%>

Then the earth <S%H776><s%> shook <S%H1607><s%> and trembled; <S%H7493><s%> the foundations <S%H4146><s%> also of the hills <S%H2022><s%> moved <S%H7264><s%> and were shaken, <S%H1607><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he was wroth. <S%H2734><s%>

There went <S%H5927><s%> up a smoke <S%H6227><s%> out of his nostrils, <S%H639><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> out of his mouth <S%H6310><s%> devoured: <S%H398><s%> coals <S%H1513><s%> were kindled <S%H1197><s%> by it.
He bowed <S%H5186><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> also, and came <S%H3381><s%> down: <S%H3381><s%> and darkness <S%H6205><s%> was under <S%H8478><s%> his feet. <S%H7272><s%>
And he rode <S%H7392><s%> on a cherub, <S%H3742><s%> and did fly: <S%H5774><s%> yes, he did fly <S%H1675><s%> on the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the wind. <S%H7307><s%>

He made <S%H7896><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> his secret <S%H5643><s%> place; his pavilion <S%H5521><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about him were dark <S%H2824><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> and thick clouds <S%H5645><s%> of the skies. <S%H7834><s%>
At the brightness <S%H5051><s%> that was before <S%H5048><s%> him his thick clouds <S%H5645><s%> passed, <S%H5674><s%> hail <S%H1259><s%> stones and coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> also thundered <S%H7481><s%> in the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and the Highest <S%H5945><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> his voice; <S%H6963><s%> hail <S%H1259><s%> stones and coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>
Yes, he sent <S%H7971><s%> out his arrows, <S%H2671><s%> and scattered <S%H6327><s%> them; and he shot <S%H7232><s%> out lightning, <S%H1300><s%> and discomfited <S%H1949><s%> them.

Then the channels <S%H650><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> were seen, <S%H7200><s%> and the foundations <S%H4146><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> were discovered <S%H1540><s%> at your rebuke, <S%H1606><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> at the blast <S%H5397><s%> of the breath <S%H7307><s%> of your nostrils. <S%H639><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> from above, <S%H4791><s%> he took <S%H3947><s%> me, he drew <S%H4871><s%> me out of many <S%H7227><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>
He delivered <S%H5337><s%> me from my strong <S%H5794><s%> enemy, <S%H341><s%> and from them which hated <S%H8130><s%> me: for they were too strong <S%H553><s%> for me.
They prevented <S%H6923><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my calamity: <S%H343><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was my stay. <S%H4937><s%>
He brought <S%H3318><s%> me forth <S%H3318><s%> also into a large <S%H4800><s%> place; <S%H4800><s%> he delivered <S%H2502><s%> me, because <S%H3588><s%> he delighted <S%H2654><s%> in me.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> rewarded <S%H1580><s%> me according to my righteousness; <S%H6664><s%> according to the cleanness <S%H1252><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%> has he recompensed <S%H7725><s%> me.
For I have kept <S%H8104><s%> the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and have not wickedly <S%H7561><s%> departed from my God. <S%H430><s%>
For all <S%H3605><s%> his judgments <S%H4941><s%> were before <S%H5048><s%> me, and I did not put <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> his statutes <S%H2708><s%> from me.
I was also upright <S%H8549><s%> before <S%H5973><s%> him, and I kept <S%H8104><s%> myself from my iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

Therefore has the LORD <S%H3068><s%> recompensed <S%H7725><s%> me according to my righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> according to the cleanness <S%H1252><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%> in his eyesight. <S%H5869><s%>
With the merciful <S%H2623><s%> you will show yourself merciful; <S%H2616><s%> with an upright <S%H8549><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> you will show yourself upright; <S%H8549><s%>
With the pure <S%H1305><s%> you will show yourself pure; <S%H1305><s%> and with the fraudulent <S%H6141><s%> you will show yourself devious. <S%H6617><s%>
For you will save <S%H3467><s%> the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> people; <S%H5971><s%> but will bring <S%H8213><s%> down <S%H8213><s%> high <S%H7311><s%> looks. <S%H5869><s%>
For you will light <S%H215><s%> my candle: <S%H5216><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> will enlighten <S%H5050><s%> my darkness. <S%H2822><s%>
For by you I have run <S%H7323><s%> through a troop; <S%H1416><s%> and by my God <S%H430><s%> have I leaped <S%H1801><s%> over a wall. <S%H7791><s%>

As for God, <S%H410><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> is perfect: <S%H8549><s%> the word <S%H565><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is tried: <S%H6884><s%> he is a buckler <S%H4043><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> those that trust <S%H2620><s%> in him.
For who <S%H4310><s%> is God <S%H433><s%> save <S%H1107><s%> the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> or who <S%H4310><s%> is a rock <S%H6697><s%> save <S%H2108><s%> our God? <S%H430><s%>
It is God <S%H410><s%> that girds <S%H247><s%> me with strength, <S%H2428><s%> and makes <S%H5414><s%> my way <S%H1870><s%> perfect. <S%H8549><s%>
He makes <S%H7737><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> like hinds' <S%H355><s%> feet, <S%H7272><s%> and sets <S%H5975><s%> me on my high <S%H1116><s%> places.
He teaches <S%H3925><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> to war, <S%H4421><s%> so that a bow <S%H7198><s%> of steel <S%H5154><s%> is broken <S%H5181><s%> by my arms. <S%H2220><s%>

You have also given <S%H5414><s%> me the shield <S%H4043><s%> of your salvation: <S%H3468><s%> and your right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> has held <S%H5582><s%> me up, and your gentleness <S%H6038><s%> has made me great. <S%H7235><s%>
You have enlarged <S%H7337><s%> my steps <S%H6806><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> me, that my feet <S%H7166><s%> did not slip. <S%H4571><s%>

I have pursued <S%H7291><s%> my enemies, <S%H341><s%> and overtaken <S%H5381><s%> them: neither <S%H3808><s%> did I turn <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> they were consumed. <S%H3615><s%>
I have wounded <S%H4272><s%> them that they were not able <S%H3201><s%> to rise: <S%H6965><s%> they are fallen <S%H5307><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> my feet. <S%H7272><s%>
For you have girded <S%H247><s%> me with strength <S%H2428><s%> to the battle: <S%H4421><s%> you have subdued <S%H3766><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> me those that rose <S%H6965><s%> up against me.
You have also given <S%H5414><s%> me the necks <S%H6203><s%> of my enemies; <S%H341><s%> that I might destroy <S%H6789><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> me.
They cried, <S%H7768><s%> but there was none <S%H369><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> them: even to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> but he answered <S%H6030><s%> them not.

Then did I beat <S%H7833><s%> them small as the dust <S%H6083><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the wind: <S%H7307><s%> I did cast <S%H7324><s%> them out as the dirt <S%H2916><s%> in the streets. <S%H2351><s%>

You have delivered <S%H6403><s%> me from the strivings <S%H7379><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%> and you have made <S%H7760><s%> me the head <S%H7218><s%> of the heathen: <S%H1471><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> whom I have not known <S%H3045><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> me.
As soon as they hear <S%H8085><s%> of me, they shall obey <S%H8085><s%> me: the strangers <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> shall submit <S%H3584><s%> themselves to me.
The strangers <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> shall fade <S%H5034><s%> away, and be afraid <S%H2727><s%> out of their close <S%H4526><s%> places.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> lives; <S%H2416><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> be my rock; <S%H6697><s%> and let the God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation <S%H3468><s%> be exalted. <S%H7311><s%>
It is God <S%H410><s%> that avenges <S%H5414><s%> <S%H5360><s%> me, and subdues <S%H1696><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> me.

He delivers <S%H6403><s%> me from my enemies: <S%H341><s%> yes, <S%H637><s%> you lift <S%H7311><s%> me up above those that rise <S%H6965><s%> up against me: you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> me from the violent <S%H2555><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>
Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> will I give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and sing praises to your name. <S%H8034><s%>

Great <S%H1431><s%> deliverance <S%H3444><s%> gives he to his king; <S%H4428><s%> and shows <S%H6213><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> to his anointed, <S%H4899><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> and to his seed <S%H2233><s%> for ever more. <S%H5769><s%>
